features.title: Why Netlify

items.title: Composable Web Architecture
items.description: Build performant, secure, and scalable websites and apps with a composable architecture.

items.title: High-Performance Edge
items.description: A programmable, high-performance edge network that is faster than other cloud providers.

items.title: Serverless Functions
items.description: Run on-demand serverless functions that automatically scale to meet your needs.

items.title: Developer Workflow
items.description: A Git-based workflow for faster development, easier collaboration, and shorter time to market.

items.title: Enterprise-Grade Platform
items.description: A robust platform with the security, compliance, and performance that enterprises demand.

items.title: Integrations
